description: This domain exposes CSS read/write operations. All CSS objects, like stylesheets, rules, and styles, have an associated id used in subsequent operations on the related object. Each object type has a specific id structure, and those are not interchangeable between objects of different kinds. CSS objects can be loaded using the get*ForNode() calls (which accept a DOM node id). Alternatively, a client can discover all the existing stylesheets with the getAllStyleSheets() method and subsequently load the required stylesheet contents using the getStyleSheet[Text]() methods.

types.description: This object identifies a CSS style in a unique way.

properties.name: styleSheetId
properties.description: Enclosing stylesheet identifier.

properties.name: ordinal
properties.description: The style ordinal within the stylesheet.

types.description: Stylesheet type: "user" for user stylesheets, "user-agent" for user-agent stylesheets, "inspector" for stylesheets created by the inspector (i.e. those holding the "via inspector" rules), "regular" for regular stylesheets.
This object identifies a CSS rule in a unique way.

properties.name: styleSheetId
properties.description: Enclosing stylesheet identifier.

properties.name: ordinal
properties.description: The rule ordinal within the stylesheet.

types.description: Pseudo-style identifier (see enum PseudoId in RenderStyleConstants.h).
Pseudo-style identifier (see enum PseudoId in RenderStyleConstants.h).
CSS rule collection for a single pseudo style.

properties.name: matches
properties.description: Matches of CSS rules applicable to the pseudo style.

types.description: CSS rule collection for a single pseudo style.

properties.name: inlineStyle
properties.description: The ancestor node's inline style, if any, in the style inheritance chain.

properties.name: matchedCSSRules
properties.description: Matches of CSS rules matching the ancestor node in the style inheritance chain.

types.description: Match data for a CSS rule.

properties.name: rule
properties.description: CSS rule in the match.

properties.name: matchingSelectors
properties.description: Matching selector indices in the rule's selectorList selectors (0-based).

types.description: CSS selector.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Canonicalized selector text.

properties.name: specificity
properties.description: Specificity (a, b, c) tuple. Included if the selector is sent in response to CSS.getMatchedStylesForNode which provides a context element.

properties.name: dynamic
properties.description: Whether or not the specificity can be dynamic. Included if the selector is sent in response to CSS.getMatchedStylesForNode which provides a context element.

types.description: Selector list data.

properties.name: selectors
properties.description: Selectors in the list.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Rule selector text.

properties.name: range
properties.description: Rule selector range in the underlying resource (if available).

types.description: CSS style information for a DOM style attribute.

properties.name: name
properties.description: DOM attribute name (e.g. "width").

properties.name: style
properties.description: CSS style generated by the respective DOM attribute.

types.description: CSS stylesheet meta-information.

properties.name: styleSheetId
properties.description: The stylesheet identifier.

properties.name: frameId
properties.description: Owner frame identifier.

properties.name: sourceURL
properties.description: Stylesheet resource URL.

properties.name: origin
properties.description: Stylesheet origin.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Stylesheet title.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Denotes whether the stylesheet is disabled.

properties.name: isInline
properties.description: Whether this stylesheet is a <style> tag created by the parser. This is not set for document.written <style> tags.

properties.name: startLine
properties.description: Line offset of the stylesheet within the resource (zero based).

properties.name: startColumn
properties.description: Column offset of the stylesheet within the resource (zero based).

types.description: CSS stylesheet contents.

properties.name: styleSheetId
properties.description: The stylesheet identifier.

properties.name: rules
properties.description: Stylesheet resource URL.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Stylesheet resource contents (if available).

types.description: CSS rule representation.

properties.name: ruleId
properties.description: The CSS rule identifier (absent for user agent stylesheet and user-specified stylesheet rules).

properties.name: selectorList
properties.description: Rule selector data.

properties.name: sourceURL
properties.description: Parent stylesheet resource URL (for regular rules).

properties.name: sourceLine
properties.description: Line ordinal of the rule selector start character in the resource.

properties.name: origin
properties.description: Parent stylesheet's origin.

properties.name: style
properties.description: Associated style declaration.

properties.name: groupings
properties.description: Grouping list array (for rules involving @media/@supports). The array enumerates CSS groupings starting with the innermost one, going outwards.

properties.name: isImplicitlyNested
properties.description: true if this style is for a rule implicitly wrapping properties declared inside of CSSGrouping.

types.description: Text range within a resource.

properties.name: startLine
properties.description: Start line of range.

properties.name: startColumn
properties.description: Start column of range (inclusive).

properties.name: endLine
properties.description: End line of range

properties.name: endColumn
properties.description: End column of range (exclusive).

properties.name: name
properties.description: Shorthand name.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Shorthand value.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Property name.

properties.name: aliases
properties.description: Other names for this property.

properties.name: longhands
properties.description: Longhand property names.

properties.name: values
properties.description: Supported values for this property.

properties.name: inherited
properties.description: Whether the property is able to be inherited.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Computed style property name.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Computed style property value.

types.description: CSS style representation.

properties.name: styleId
properties.description: The CSS style identifier (absent for attribute styles).

properties.name: cssProperties
properties.description: CSS properties in the style.

properties.name: shorthandEntries
properties.description: Computed values for all shorthands found in the style.

properties.name: cssText
properties.description: Style declaration text (if available).

properties.name: range
properties.description: Style declaration range in the enclosing stylesheet (if available).

properties.name: width
properties.description: The effective "width" property value from this style.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The effective "height" property value from this style.

types.description: The property status: "active" if the property is effective in the style, "inactive" if the property is overridden by a same-named property in this style later on, "disabled" if the property is disabled by the user, "style" (implied if absent) if the property is reported by the browser rather than by the CSS source parser.
CSS style effective visual dimensions and source offsets.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The property name.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The property value.

properties.name: priority
properties.description: The property priority (implies "" if absent).

properties.name: implicit
properties.description: Whether the property is implicit (implies false if absent).

properties.name: text
properties.description: The full property text as specified in the style.

properties.name: parsedOk
properties.description: Whether the property is understood by the browser (implies true if absent).

properties.name: status
properties.description: Whether the property is active or disabled.

properties.name: range
properties.description: The entire property range in the enclosing style declaration (if available).

types.description: CSS @media (as well as other users of media queries, like @import, <style>, <link>, etc.), @supports, and @layer descriptor.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Source of the media query: "media-rule" if specified by a @media rule, "media-import-rule" if specified by an @import rule, "media-link-node" if specified by a "media" attribute in a linked style sheet's LINK tag, "media-style-node" if specified by a "media" attribute in an inline style sheet's STYLE tag, "supports-rule" if specified by an @supports rule, "layer-rule" if specified by an @layer rule, "container-rule" if specified by an @container rule, "style-rule" if specified by a CSSStyleRule containing the rule inside this grouping.

properties.name: ruleId
properties.description: The CSS rule identifier for the `@rule` (absent for non-editable grouping rules) or the nesting parent style rule's selector. In CSSOM terms, this is the parent rule of either the previous Grouping for a CSSRule, or of a CSSRule itself.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Query text if specified by a @media, @supports, or @container rule. Layer name (or not present for anonymous layers) for @layer rules.

properties.name: sourceURL
properties.description: URL of the document containing the CSS grouping.

properties.name: range
properties.description: @-rule's header text range in the enclosing stylesheet (if available). This is from the first non-whitespace character after the @ declarartion to the last non-whitespace character before an opening curly bracket or semicolon.

types.description: A representation of WebCore::Font. Conceptually this is backed by either a font file on disk or from the network.

properties.name: displayName
properties.description: The display name defined by the font.

properties.name: variationAxes
properties.description: The variation axes defined by the font.

properties.name: synthesizedBold
properties.description: Whether the font has synthesized its boldness or not.

properties.name: synthesizedOblique
properties.description: Whether the font has synthesized its obliqueness or not

types.description: A single variation axis associated with a Font.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name, generally human-readable, of the variation axis. Some axes may not provide a human-readable name distiguishable from the tag. This field is ommited when there is no name, or the name matches the tag exactly.

properties.name: tag
properties.description: The four character tag for the variation axis.

properties.name: minimumValue
properties.description: The minimum value that will affect the axis.

properties.name: maximumValue
properties.description: The maximum value that will affect the axis.

properties.name: defaultValue
properties.description: The value that is used for the axis when it is not otherwise controlled.

types.description: Relevant layout information about the node. Things not in this list are not important to Web Inspector.

The mode for how layout context type changes are handled (default: Observed). Observed limits handling to those nodes already known to the frontend by other means (generally, this means the node is a visible item in the Elements tab). All informs the frontend of all layout context type changes and all nodes with a known layout context are sent to the frontend.

commands.name: enable
commands.description: Enables the CSS agent for the given page. Clients should not assume that the CSS agent has been enabled until the result of this command is received.

commands.name: disable
commands.description: Disables the CSS agent for the given page.

commands.name: getMatchedStylesForNode
commands.description: Returns requested styles for a DOM node identified by nodeId.

parameters.name: includePseudo
parameters.description: Whether to include pseudo styles (default: true).

parameters.name: includeInherited
parameters.description: Whether to include inherited styles (default: true).

returns.name: matchedCSSRules
returns.description: CSS rules matching this node, from all applicable stylesheets.

returns.name: pseudoElements
returns.description: Pseudo style matches for this node.

returns.name: inherited
returns.description: A chain of inherited styles (from the immediate node parent up to the DOM tree root).

commands.name: getInlineStylesForNode
commands.description: Returns the styles defined inline (explicitly in the "style" attribute and implicitly, using DOM attributes) for a DOM node identified by nodeId.

returns.name: inlineStyle
returns.description: Inline style for the specified DOM node.

returns.name: attributesStyle
returns.description: Attribute-defined element style (e.g. resulting from "width=20 height=100%").

commands.name: getComputedStyleForNode
commands.description: Returns the computed style for a DOM node identified by nodeId.

returns.name: computedStyle
returns.description: Computed style for the specified DOM node.

commands.name: getFontDataForNode
commands.description: Returns the primary font of the computed font cascade for a DOM node identified by nodeId.

returns.name: primaryFont
returns.description: Computed primary font for the specified DOM node.

commands.name: getAllStyleSheets
commands.description: Returns metainfo entries for all known stylesheets.

returns.name: headers
returns.description: Descriptor entries for all available stylesheets.

commands.name: getStyleSheet
commands.description: Returns stylesheet data for the specified styleSheetId.

commands.name: getStyleSheetText
commands.description: Returns the current textual content and the URL for a stylesheet.

commands.name: setStyleSheetText
commands.description: Sets the new stylesheet text, thereby invalidating all existing CSSStyleId's and CSSRuleId's contained by this stylesheet.

commands.name: setStyleText
commands.description: Sets the new text for the respective style.

returns.name: style
returns.description: The resulting style after the text modification.

returns.name: rule
returns.description: The resulting rule after the selector modification.

returns.name: grouping
returns.description: The resulting grouping after the header text modification.

commands.name: createStyleSheet
commands.description: Creates a new special "inspector" stylesheet in the frame with given frameId.

parameters.name: frameId
parameters.description: Identifier of the frame where the new "inspector" stylesheet should be created.

commands.name: addRule
commands.description: Creates a new empty rule with the given selector in a stylesheet with given styleSheetId.

commands.name: getSupportedCSSProperties
commands.description: Returns all supported CSS property names.

commands.name: getSupportedSystemFontFamilyNames
commands.description: Returns all supported system font family names.

commands.name: forcePseudoState
commands.description: Ensures that the given node will have specified pseudo-classes whenever its style is computed by the browser.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: The element id for which to force the pseudo state.

parameters.name: forcedPseudoClasses
parameters.description: Element pseudo classes to force when computing the element's style.

commands.name: setLayoutContextTypeChangedMode
commands.description: Change how layout context type changes are handled for nodes. When the new mode would observe nodes the frontend has not yet recieved, those nodes will be sent to the frontend immediately.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode for how layout context type changes are handled.

events.name: mediaQueryResultChanged
events.description: Fires whenever a MediaQuery result changes (for example, after a browser window has been resized.) The current implementation considers only viewport-dependent media features.

events.name: styleSheetChanged
events.description: Fired whenever a stylesheet is changed as a result of the client operation.

events.name: styleSheetAdded
events.description: Fired whenever an active document stylesheet is added.

events.name: styleSheetRemoved
events.description: Fired whenever an active document stylesheet is removed.

events.name: nodeLayoutFlagsChanged
events.description: Called when the layout of a node changes in a way that is important to Web Inspector.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the node whose layout changed.

parameters.name: layoutFlags
parameters.description: Relevant information about the layout of the node. When not provided, the layout of the node is not important to Web Inspector.
